effect.scarlet_violet: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.the_teal_mask: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP at the end of each turn. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Restores 1/16 of the user’s max HP each turn.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.
